amendment.description: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to ensure that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Securities and Exchange Commission to approve the proposed rule of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board titled "Proposing Release: Amendments to PCAOB Auditing Standards related to a Company's Noncompliance with Laws and Regulations; And Other Related Amendments" (published June 6, 2023).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
